comment: Professor Brown is an extraordinary professor, I could not recommend her enough! She gives AMAZING feedback on all projects, so you can really learn and develop skills. Also very respectful of everybody in the class, and super understanding. She is super open to new ideas when working with the different projects in the course as well. Take her!

Easiest A ever, definitely take her class if you get the chance! All quizzes and the final are done through a third-party website with no lockdown browser and several attempts. Only one required museum visit and is super easy to complete.

Goat teacher. Took maybe 15 min a week for like 2 quizzes a week. Art discussions seem heavy at first but are so easy and she doesnt grade harshly. I missed a discussion post and found out near the end of the semester and she let me do it for like basically no penalty.
Literally the best professor and easiest class ever, just take her
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Probably one of my easiest classes at ksu. We do have discussion posts but they are spaced out and easy and short. An online website is used for HW and quizzes that are due each week but are very easy and take less than an hour. There are a total of 4 art criticisms throughout the semester and are pretty easy. She doesn't grade harsh. Take her!!

Take her!! She is amazing and gives good feedback /advice if you are struggling on a project!! Most of class time is working on the assigned art projects, she was also kind and understandable, she let us leave early than the actual class time.I would take her again if I have too!!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Love her! She is so sweet and very respectful of everyone. The work is easy since you do 80% of it in class she is there to help with any questions. She gives you room to do what you want with assignments without many limitations. She has a daughter in school so she understands you have a life outside of class and is very caring. Lovely lady

TAKE HER. Spent about 15mins a week on this online class. Super straightforward, no tricks. Anyone taking this just needs it for their core, no reason to not do it this way. I don't feel like I even worked for my A. She removed like 2 papers halfway thru the class. TAKE HER ONLINE CLASS.

Never actually interacted with the teacher, but she sends soooo many reminders about assignments that it makes it impossible to miss something. I 100% recommend taking her class. Weekly quizzes, 4 written assignments (very short) and a final exam. The final was the hardest thing because it was 100 questions but the material was very easy. Easy A!
Very respectful of pronouns and people of different dispositions, caring and very supportive of students work and progress. I found my confidence in drawing with her.
She is an amazing professor. I recommend asking for help or share your ideas with her. She will help add to your ideas and make them stronger. She taught me a lot.

Professor Brown is so sweet. She really cares for her students! During this hectic Covid semester she and only one other professor I took actually tried to make students' lives easier. I enjoyed the projects she gave and I learned so much from her class. She gives great feedback and explains things so well. She also loves cats!

This professor is a saint. She is very kind and compassionate. You definitely have to work for a good grade, and she did not beat around the bush when it came to critiques, but she was very patient and easy to talk to. She cares about the course material, and she cares even more for her students. She is easily the best professor I've had so far.
